property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: A U.S. service member signing a guest log in Pakistan

note.text: Pakistan and the U.S. have been allies since Pakistanâ€™s establishment in 1947. However, many Pakistanis are skeptical about America's presence in the region. They may hold negative opinions about the U.S. even if they work with Americans.

Although Pakistanis may not agree with official U.S. policy, members of the military are generally very friendly and hospitable toward U.S. service members. Being friendly and approachable in return will go a long way toward building trust with your counterparts.
